column2: Small chance for death every 5 years.
More chances for death every month
People will die at a ridiculous rate
The rich have find out about your money issues. They force you into exile to ensure you never return
The peasants have grown particular disgruntled with your rule. They force themselves into your palace and kill you where you stand
The church increasingly worried by your heathen ways, secretly organise a coup and burn you alive
During a training event, a stray arrow hits you in the chest. You die on the spot
